articles.title: Joyce Cheng, daughter of late Lydia Sum, reportedly gets $10.5m inheritance 14 years after mum's death - AsiaOne
articles.description: Hong Kong singer-actress Joyce Cheng turned 35 on Monday (May 30), marking a big change in her life. According to media reports, she has now inherited HK$60 million (S$10.5 million) worth of assets from her late mother, comedian Lydia Sum, who died aged 63 in…
articles.content:
Hong Kong singer-actress Joyce Cheng turned 35 on Monday (May 30), marking a big change in her life.

articles.description: “Both of them will work again, but I think it will be a while before a major studio will consider them ‘safe’ enough to bet on,” said a former entertainment lawyer.

articles.title: 2 dogs died after trainer forgot they were in car boot - AsiaOne

articles.title: Duterte doubles incentives for Filipino medalists in SEA Games - Rappler
articles.description: 'I am very proud of you,' President Rodrigo Duterte tells Filipino athletes as the Philippines finishes fourth overall in the Southeast Asian Games in Vietnam
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines Satisfied with the Philippines’ performance in the Southeast Asian Games in Vietnam, President Rodrigo Duterte doubled the incentives of Filipino medalists in the biennial meet.
